title: Reorganize vignettes following Diataxis framework
description:
Restructure vignettes to follow Diataxis documentation framework (https://diataxis.fr/).

## Current Mapping:

### TUTORIALS (learning-oriented)
- measure.Rmd → tutorial-getting-started.Rmd
- sec-analysis-example.Rmd → tutorial-bioreactor.Rmd

### HOW-TO GUIDES (task-oriented)
- baseline.Rmd → howto-baseline.Rmd
- recipes.Rmd → howto-tidymodels.Rmd
- roles-diagnostics.Rmd → howto-data-organization.Rmd

### REFERENCE (information-oriented)
- preprocessing.Rmd → reference-preprocessing.Rmd
- multidimensional.Rmd → reference-multidimensional.Rmd
- validation.Rmd → reference-validation.Rmd

### EXPLANATION (understanding-oriented)
- internals.Rmd → explanation-internals.Rmd

## Tasks:
1. Rename vignette files with Diataxis prefixes
2. Update VignetteIndexEntry titles to include category
3. Update _pkgdown.yml to group articles by Diataxis category
4. Add introduction explaining documentation structure
5. Cross-link related vignettes within categories
